original_text: Soon after this, Levi made a large meal for Jesus at his house. Many people also came and they were eating with them there. Some of them took taxes from people, as Levi did.
korean_text: 레위가 예수를 위하여 자기 집에서 큰 잔치를 하니 세리와 다른 사람이 많이 함께 앉아 있는지라

sentences.original_text: Levi made a large meal for Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 레위는 예수님을 위해 큰 잔치를 준비했다

sentences.original_text: and they were eating with them there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그곳에서 그들과 함께 식사했다

sentences.original_text: Some of them took taxes from people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 일부는 사람들에게서 세금을 거두었다
